sect2.title: Contents of Modutils
sect2.para: The Modutils package contains programs that you can use to work with kernel modules.

sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: depmod, genksyms, insmod, insmod_ksymoops_clean, kallsyms (link to insmod), kernelversion, ksyms (link to insmod), lsmod (link to insmod), modinfo, modprobe (link to insmod) and rmmod (link to insmod)
